surface integral example\n[imath]\iint_{\boldsymbol{S}}(\boldsymbol{y}+\boldsymbol{z}) \boldsymbol{d} \boldsymbol{S} \begin{array}{c}\n\text { where s is the } \\\n\text { portion of the } \\\n\text { cylinder of radius } \\\n\text { and height } 3 \text { in the } \\\n\text { first octant }\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\text { where s is the } [/imath] [imath]\text { portion of the } [/imath] [imath]\text { cylinder of radius } [/imath] [imath]\text { and height } 3 \text { in the } [/imath] [imath]\text { first octant }[/imath]
